H0.text: Which mammal is also known as a river horse. Rhinoceros

H1.text: Which mammal is also known as a river horse. Manatee

H2.text: Which mammal is also known as a river horse. Tapir

H3.text: Which mammal is also known as a river horse. HIPPOPOTAMUS

A4.text: Its name comes from the Ancient Greek for 'river horse' (ἱπποπόταμος).
